backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, surgery case types, access control, and CRUD-related methods with per-user case storage using Map.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Markdown notes describing when and how to redeploy the frontend with updated backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script automating clean rebuild and redeployment of the frontend with deployment summaries.
Script performing deterministic frontend rebuild, dependency install, binding generation, and build verification.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for confirming that the live frontend uses fresh backend bindings and the correct canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend connection, user profile setup, case listing, case form modals, and sorting/search UI.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty file placeholder for camera capture component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with patient info, task toggling, edit/delete actions, and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing a surgery case with prefill logic, validation, demographics extraction, and task checklist handling.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Lists surgery cases with search, sort, filtering, loading/error handling, and renders CaseCard items.
Reusable date input component combining a text field and popover calendar with validation.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts demographics from pasted text and triggers autofill.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Displays empty-state messaging and optional migration guidance depending on auth and connection state.
frontend/src/components/cases/ServerCase: Error banner showing classified backend errors with a retry button and fallback notice.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and direction for the case list.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders a filtered checklist of required, incomplete tasks with optional color-coding and toggle handling.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports stored cases as a downloadable CSV file and shows status toasts.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Handles CSV upload, parsing, validation, and importing cases with user feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Displays a troubleshooting banner for backend connection failures with retry options and guidance.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs details and shows a recovery UI when failures occur.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing app attribution, current year, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app branding and login/logout controls integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Startup error screen providing diagnostics, retry and reload actions, and token-specific guidance.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: UI bar showing online status, backend connectivity, and sync controls with toast feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to add error tracking, initialization detection, and a retry mechanism for actor creation.
Combines identity, actor state, and a backend ping probe to determine connectivity and provide retriable status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages surgery case data by merging local and server cases, with add/update mutations that persist locally.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Returns Draft or Live based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity, login state, and provider-managed session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases, including a paginated case fetcher and case creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements full client–server sync for surgery cases using pagination, merging, normalization, and local persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines LocalSurgeryCase and form-related types extending backend surgery case data.
Classifies backend errors into user-friendly categories and messages, including authorization and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts surgery cases to CSV and parses CSV files with validation and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe date-only utilities plus legacy date helpers for conversions and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Parses pasted text with regex to extract patient demographics fields. Provides fallbacks and filtering to return best‑effort structured data.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks a persisted admin token from URL or sessionStorage. Ensures token availability across the session.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, normalizes, saves, and clears locally stored surgery cases with bigint handling. Ensures consistent case structure when reading from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases, preserving local‑only fields while letting server data win. Also prepares cases for sync by applying pending local changes.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the most recent case matching an MRN and extracts demographic prefill data. Sorting prioritizes latest arrival date and caseId.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities to create, normalize, and manage task checklists. Handles legacy formats and extracts required incomplete tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support. Works with both query strings and hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins. Extends design tokens for UI components and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and required audits to remove deprecated case-loading API calls. Lists pending feature requests focused on fixing frontend calls and ensuring rebuilt deployments.
